string.name: com_lenovo_lsf_feedback_factory
string.Data: <font color=#0000ff>Download the latest version of LeFactory</font> and communicate with our team of developers directly!

"By enabling this feature, LeStore will save you the cumbersome click operations when carrying out routine apps installation or upgrading, such as for Next Step, Finish, and so on.
Note: By enabling this feature, the system will pop up a warning, LeStore is committed not to collect users' privacy through this feature. This feature only supports Android 4.1 above systems."
